nodes.text: UR-1060 was an astronomical object located in the Moddell sector of the Outer Rim Territories, in the grid square H-16 of the Standard Galactic Grid. It shared a similar designation to the nearby UR-2650, UR-3741, UR-8827, and UR-9353. UR-1060 was depicted on a map of the Moddell sector included with the Rebel Alliance collection of non-electronic documents known as The Rebel Files.

UR-1060 was introduced in the new Star Wars canon via a mention in the De Agostini magazine Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon 18, which was published around May 6, 2015. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, UR-1060 was a star located in the UR-1060 system. They were both introduced in the article "Endor and the Moddell Sector," which was published in Star Wars Gamer 9 on February 22, 2002.
